lines.text:
[singing]
I'd like to take you south of my border, and north of my garter.
Always the little ones got something to prove.
Marguerita?
The customers call me "Marguerita". The territory calls me "Marguerita". My real close friends call me "Miss Ventura."
You bitch!

Ever since I came here, you've done nothing but treat me like shit. Who the hell do you think you are? Yeah, I was a dance hall girl, but what makes you so high and mighty? You own a whorehouse! A whorehouse!... and with only three whores in it. One of them is just a senile old cow.
[aside to Big Ed]
No offense, honey.
[back to Maguerita]
And the other one's so new at it, she doesn't know which end to use. So what does that make you? The only whore in Chili Verde. Yeah, I came here for the gold, because I've been poor all my life.
You've got it all wrong, honey. You've been cheap all your life.
Cheap?
[picks up a chair, and breaks it over Maguerita]
This furniture is cheap.
Do not be afraid, my son. They will not shoot while I am beside you.
Hah! Don't count on it, Father. It's a good day for me when I get to kill a priest!
I'll be in the church.
those who lust in the dust shall die in the dust.
[Rosie's canteen falls and empties its contents in the desert]
My gin!
[Rosie is trying to coax her mule]
Only a few more little miles. Only a few more itsy-bitsy, eeny-weeny little miles...
[angry]
... and then you can drop dead, you miserable hunk of shit!
Where are you doing? Don't leave me out here, mister! Oh, I beg you! My ass is on its last legs! I'll die! I've got nothing to eat!
[Abel looks up, and shoots in the air. A dead vulture crashes to earth]

[sarcastic]
Thanks.
[Hard Case's gang moves forward to rape Rosie]
No! Stop! Wait! I'm a...
[looks down]
...virgin.
A virgin? Really?
[Rosie nods yes]
That DOES make a difference. Then I'LL go first.
[Hard Case starts sneezing violently]
I've had carnal knowledge of 215 women and two goats...
And the chicken?
[Hard Case makes a so-so gesture]
I spy with my little eye something that begins with "C". Give up? CHILE VERDE!
I'm Richard Barker. Most folks around here call me Red Dick.
[Rosie stares at him]

[sheepishly]
On account o' my hair.
Being a leader of men is a very solitary business, miss. So I've been very concerned about my men's libidos until you so conveniently came on the scene.
I'm afraid I don't understand, sir. Are you speaking English? Eso es ingles?

Poon tang! Poon tang! Is that any clearer little lady? My curse is that I've received the education befitting the son of a Boston preacher, may he rot in hellfire. But I do believe that you get the thrust of my meaning. My men are as horny as jackrabbits.
Freeze, hombre. Or I'll be wearing your asshole for a garter.
I am the best French kisser in Chile Verde.
If I come across a Frenchman, I'll be sure to let him know.

[at Rosie, who is scrubbing the floor]
Finished, Honey?
You could eat off this floor. And *you* probably will.

[at Rosie, who is scrubbing the floor]
There *are* other ways of earning your keep around here, you know.
[implying prostitution]
I'd rather die first.
Why, Sugar, you must've died a thousand times.
[laughing]
Lose your way, Honey?
Well, it's the cockroach's shift. *I* sleep from 3 to 10.
If you don't like this place, you can git.
Oh, yeah. Well I ain't going nowhere until I find that gold that everybody's been so careful *not* to mention.
You think you can just breeze into town and dig it up, huh? Buena suerte. Some of us have been looking for it for *years*.

[snidely]
You can tell.

[insinuating Rosie killed Red Dick]
So... that only leaves *one* person.
Don't look at me; I slept like a log.
Why not? You look like one.
Hey! Be careful with those scissors.

[sticks scissors up against his crotch]
Okay big boy, one move out of you, one lie, and I'll be wearing your jinglebobs for earrings. Nod if you follow my drift.
[Big Ed comes in the room to see Hardcase Williams tied up and naked on the bed]
Mr. Williams, you should be ashamed of yourself.
Think nothing of it. It's just an early morning condition. A lot of men get it. Would you untie me?

[impressed by his erection]
Oh, my goodness!
Lady, this is no time to be pointing an accusing finger.
At least it's only my finger that's pointing!
Oh well. Maybe he'll be back tomorrow. After all, tomorrow *is* another day.

[to Rosie, after her audition song]
Ya sing like ya look!
How long has it been since your last confession, my son?
'Bout twenty years.

[pricks himself with needle while sewing]
Aye!
I just have to get a few things off my chest... Lets see, first there was, uh, this girl in El Paso... her mother... and her grand-mother.
[continuing confession in a later scene]
Many men like horses, my son.
But Doc Holliday *really* liked horses, Father. Well, what do you think he was doing in the O.K. Corral early in the morning?
[continuing confession in a later scene]
And then there was the time with the two lockjaw Indian maidens.
You mean "Choctaw" Indians, my son. There are no "lockjaw" Indians.
There are now.
